title: Audit of public school accounts
context: §40-83 Audit of public school accounts. The comptroller shall cause to be examined and audited books of account kept by any public school in connection with school fees and all other moneys collected by these schools. All books of account shall be kept in such manner as shall be prescribed by the comptroller. [L 1932 2d, c 27, §1; RL 1935, §560; RL 1945, §1562; RL 1955, §34-11; am L 1957, c 152, §1; HRS §40-83]
